SELECT oo.order_id, oo.shop_name, oo.ord_consumer_id, oo.ord_consumer_name, oo.ord_supplier, oo.ord_price, oo.shop_id, oo.ord_express_no, oo.express_id, oo.ord_status, oo.ord_remake, oo.locale_id, oo.create_time, om.menu_name as 'express_name', os.supplier_name, oo.ord_profit, oo.ord_cost FROM oa_order oo LEFT JOIN oa_menu om ON om.menu_id = oo.express_id LEFT JOIN oa_supplier os ON os.supplier_id = oo.ord_supplier
and oo.`logic_del` = 1
order by oo.create_time desc

SELECT oo.order_id, oo.shop_name, oo.ord_consumer_name, oo.ord_supplier, oo.ord_price, oo.ord_express_no, oo.ord_status, oo.ord_remake, oo.express_id, oo.create_time, og.goods_id, og.goods_name, og.cost_price, og.goods_desc, og.goods_status FROM oa_order oo LEFT JOIN oa_order_goods_relation oogr ON oo.order_id = oogr.order_id LEFT JOIN oa_goods og ON og.goods_id = oogr.goods_id WHERE oo.`logic_del` = 1 AND oo.`order_id` = #{p1}

SELECT SUM(cast(ord_price as DECIMAL)) as 'sale_total', SUM(cast(ord_cost as DECIMAL)) as 'cost_total', SUM(cast(ord_profit as DECIMAL)) as 'profit_total' FROM oa_order
and `logic_del` = 1
